title: 820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
message:
820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
This boards is working one except battery not detected.

 R5380: 1.9K,   
R5381: 1.9k,   
PPBUS_G3H: 8.58V with  charger
diode mode
J6950 P4: 0.473, 
J6950 P5: 0.473 ,
J6950 P6: OL
R6950: 10 K
This is good battery works with other unit.
Any help please.

title: 820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
message:
Check with o-scope for pulses at SCL/SDA lines.
You can start replacing U7100 first; be sure R7100 is good.
The last option is SMC...

title: 820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
message: Found pulses at SCL/SDA lines. R7100 is good.Replacing U7100 . Rflow SMC but no luck. This is my second one mb but no luck. Dont know what the exactly issue.

title: 820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
message:
Change SMC now...

Is this liquid spill?
Be sure battery connector is clean.

title: 820-00165-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
message:
Had the same problem, i followed this post. I changed the smc, it is working.
Thanks
